channel.title: Lists Practice :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: Letâ€™s try some simple practice problems. These problems are not graded - they are just for you to practice before doing the real exercises in the lab itself. You can find the answers below each question by clicking the button below each question. 7.1 Reading Code Consider the following Python program: def positive_input(): x = int(input("Enter a positive integer: ")) while x <= 0: print("Invalid input!") x = int(input("Enter a positive integer: ")) return x def foo(numbers): output = [] for i in range(0, len(numbers) - 1, 2): output.
